page.title: 12The Coastguard
page.content: There are two qualifications you need, to start to be a coastguard.Firstly you must have been at sea for at least six years and a qualified navigator. You also have to be quite good at climbing and first aid.You must be able to keep calm during terrifying experiences.You must know what the flares mean:a red flare means danger, I'm in trouble.A white flare means: Warning,your to close.You must be able to work a radio,and you go to school for two weeks every year to learn about the new equipment.You must be able to swim quite a distance.Mr Pink is our area coastgaurd.His area is from Dittisham up the River Dart right around to Kingsbridge.One of Mr Pinks funniest jobs was when he got a call from somebody,saying that there was a soldier trapped down a mine shaft,he found 7 soldiers and one policeman.
